title: What will Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe Look Like? Blue Kits but No Pidcock, Van Aert for Incoming Mega-Team
content:
Officials rule out imminent arrival of Pidcock, Van Aert, Evenepoel as hype builds for Red Bull's arrival at the Tour de France: 'Winning the Tour drives me every day'

Read the full article at What will Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe Look Like? Blue Kits but No Pidcock, Van Aert for Incoming Mega-Team on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
